ygData.subject: Re: Level 30,35,40,45, and a "power level" comme
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheh, when I was a teenager, and you mentioned roleplaying to an adult they either thought it was something you did with your therapist or it meant you
ygData.messageBody:
Heheh, when I was a teenager, and you mentioned roleplaying to an adult they
either thought it was something you did with your therapist or it meant you
worshipped satan. Back then, nobody roleplayed but kids (Ya! I was one who
ran around in a sewer pretending to be a dwarf!), and the adults were the
clueless kewldudes in their polyester leisure suits.

Roop


>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
>The problem with this is that it is another generalization granted there
are

>there are some adults that fit into that category. The only problem with
